column2: Rockport Men's Mubleno Distressed Brown Shoe
column22:
• Product Description
  • Product Details

  • Talk about walking comfort in dress shoes
column23: and there's no better brand that can offer it than rockport. To experience the delightful feeling of walking on air all day long
column24: slip your feet into the Mubleno oxfords from rockport. Engineered with the Dynamic Suspension technology
column25: it is the perfect pair of formal shoes for those long days at work. A great addition to any sophisticated man's wardrobe
column26:
it can add tons of character to your outfit in an instant.

Upper



  • Full-grain distressed leather upper for added durability
column27:
style and comfort
  • Fabric lining for better breathability

  • Tapered square apron toe design for a sleek look

  • Lace-up system with synthetic laces for a snug
column28:
customized Fit
  • Padded tongue to protect from excessive rubbing and prevent blisters

  • Leather wrap-around overlay along the heel and midfoot for better support

  • Contrast intricate stitch detailing for added style and durability

  • Rolled
column29:
padded collar for extra comfort and a snug fit

Midsole



  • EVA midsole with shock absorbers for lightweight comfort

  • Dynamic Suspension technology that creates a thin air cushion under the foot
column30: moving according to the pressure of your foot from heel to toe
column31:
ensuring maximum comfort even with the slightest movement
  • Removable footbed to accommodate an orthotic


    • Outsole



    • Lightweight
column32:
slip-resistant rubber outsole delivers shock absorption reducing foot fatigue
  • Stacked heel for a better grip

  • Textured pattern on the heel
column33:
midfoot and forefoot for better grip
  • Flex grooves on the forefoot and heel for ease of movement and improving grip on various surfaces


    • shoe care
    Wipe surface with a dry
column34:
clean cloth to remove dust
Use a branded leather conditioner and leather brush to restore shine
Do not store in direct sunlight

column22:
• Product Description
  • Product Details

  • rockport Abraim is the first-ever classic dress shoe engineered with an athletic sole. Made for professional men who love their formal wear and want to look sharp and crisp
column23: this shoe is lighter than traditional running shoes
column24: coming with great shock absorbers that allow you to run from one meeting to another without feeling any stress or fear of slips and sprains. Replete with a smooth
column25: flawless upper and a plain toe silhouette
column26:
it's a great addition to any sophisticated man's wardrobe.

Upper



  • Full-grain leather upper for added durability and style

  • Perforations in a definite design for improved ventilation and style

  • Nappa leather lining for moisture absorption and abrasion resistance

  • Plain toe design for a neater
column27:
crisper look and extra durability
  • Strobel construction for added stability and forefoot flexibility

  • Lace-up system with synthetic laces for a snug
column28:
customized Fit
  • Mesh inner for ample breathability

  • Lightly padded tongue with perforations for better ventilation

  • Leather wrap-around overlay along the heel and midfoot for better support

  • Brand badge on lateral heel


    • Midsole



    • EVA midsole with shock absorbers for lightweight comfort

    • Moisture-absorbent and odour-resistant ortholite footbed for all-day comfort

    • Removable footbed to accomodate an orthotic


    Outsole



    • Lightweight
column29:
slip-resistant rubber outsole delivers shock absorption reducing foot fatigue
  • Horizontal grooves throughout for better grip

  • Rectangular grooves on the lateral heel
column30:
midfoot and medial forefoot for imrpoved grip and traction on various surfaces
  • Horse shoe pattern with scooped heel for enhanced cushioing

  • Flex grooves in the forefoot for easy movement

  • Raised heel for a stylish look


    • Shoe care
    Wipe surface with a dry
column31:
clean cloth to remove dust
Use a branded leather conditioner and leather brush to restore shine
Do not store in direct sunlightUse a leather shoe polish to make the shoes shine

column2: Rockport Men's Slate Taupe Fabric Shoe
column22:
• Product Description
  • Product Details

  • Look well groomed with these shoes from the Slate collection from rockport. Designed for continuous wear and superior walking comfort
column23:
these shoes are a great combination of form and function. Team these with chinos and polo neck tees for casual Fridays or for weekend getaways.

Upper



  • Resilient forefoot cushioning provides a responsive
column24:
dynamic push-off
  • Synthetic woven uppers with full grain leather overlays for greater support and stability

  • Lace-ups for snug Fit

  • Nappa lining for comfort and breath ability

  • Heel cup for sturdy support

  • Padded collar offers protection from excessive rubbing and helps prevent blisters

  • adidas adiPRENE footbed is highly shock-absorbent and protects the heel at impact


    • Midsole



    • Polyurethane (PU) midsole offers durability for long-term wear and shock absorbent-cushioning to help reduce foot fatigue


    Outsole



    • adidas adiPRENE is a highly shock-absorbent cushioning that protects the heel at impact

    • Rubber outsole with horizontal grooves give dependable grip on a variety of surfaces


    shoe care
    Use a leather brush to dust off the dirt
    Use a leather shoe polish to make the shoes shine
    Do not store in direct sunlight

column22:
• Product Description
  • Product Details

  • This Bicycle Toe oxford from rockport called Alduna is a traditional silhouette paired with an elongated lace-up vamp. An absolute pleasure to wear and a must-have in the wardrobe of those who belive in stylish comfort
column23: the Alduna range of shoes provide a snug Fit and look sumptuous with dress pants. Designed for elegance and comfort
column24: it is engineered with DMX technology that generates air flow dynamically while you walk
column25: creating a cushion for your feet
column26:
making it an absolute favourite for everyday wear.

Upper



  • Full-grain leather upper for added  strength and durability and to retain the natural look of the  hide

  • Such leather upper also makes it easy to clean and enhances  shoe life

  • Padded tongue and collar to help protect from excessive  rubbing and prevent blisters

  • Elongated lace vamp with perforated tongue for extra snug fit and added ventilation


Midsole



  • Moulded footbed made of polyurethane (PU) for long term  wear

  • Shock absorbant cushioning to reduce foot fatigue

  • Strobel technology on the heel to provide cushioned  comfort for the feet
column27:
but is at the same time firm and  enhances support and flexibility to aid walking

Outsole



  • Flex grooves provide durable grip on various  surfaces

  • Lightweight
column28:
slip-resistant rubber outsole delivers shock  absorption reducing foot fatigue
  • Moisture absorbent
column29:
odour resistant cushioning keeps feet  dry and comfortable

Wash care
Wipe surface with soft
column31:
damp cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash
